name: EndlessWave PC Version
description: The Endless Wave is a game is created to raise funds to purchase 3 Seabins to be placed in Kewalo Basin harbor and Ala Wai Harbor where they will be maintained. This Pc version is a  Low memory version i made so all can play on there phones and tablets as well. Updates to come. Also feel free to get the fancy higher memory version with cheering crowds.
